header_text: You are outside walking and see a group of people ahead of you. As you pass them, you stumble slightly and feel a little foolish. You hear them laugh as you pass by and assume that they are laughing at jokes that aren't about you.

elements.Text: The group of walkers were probably laughing because...

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: Someone told a funny joke that was not about you
